title: Organization
description: A general concept for any organization or legal entity involved in the product lifecycle.

organizationName.description: The official legal name of the organization.

tradingName.description: The name under which the organization conducts business, if different from the legal name.

gln.description: A GS1 standard identifier for legal entities, functional departments, or physical locations.

leiCode.description: A standardized global identifier for legal entities.

additionalOrganizationId.description: An identifier for the organization other than GLN or LEI (e.g., EORI, VAT ID).

additionalOrganizationIdType.description: The type of the identifier provided in additionalOrganizationId (e.g., 'EORI', 'VAT').
